scripts.copy-datatable-kit: mkdir -p public/js/lib/datatable-kit && cp -r node_modules/@mfribeiro/datatable-kit/src/* public/js/lib/datatable-kit/ && mkdir -p public/css/lib && cp public/js/lib/datatable-kit/css/*.css public/css/lib/
scripts.copy-card-kit: mkdir -p public/js/lib/card-kit && cp -r node_modules/@mfribeiro/card-kit/src/* public/js/lib/card-kit/ && mkdir -p public/css/lib && cp public/js/lib/card-kit/css/*.css public/css/lib/
scripts.copy-lib: npm run copy-datatable-kit && npm run copy-card-kit
